title: Grow your career in the South West

content.text: A team from our leadership academy are working on a project to raise awareness of opportunities in the South West.
They would like to make colleagues aware of the Civil Service Careers website. It contains a wealth of information on the range of departments and career opportunities for you to develop your career.

If you are interested in growing your career, head over to the Civil Service Careers website to find out more. Try the Career Matcher to find vacancies that may be of interest to you and apply to grow your career. Also available on the website is an interactive map for you to explore live vacancies near you.

You can join their new LinkedIn page called “Grow your career South West”  where you can interact with other civil servants, ask questions, have conversations and find information on departments in and around the South West.
